content: *this classic dish towel hanger buttons over a drawer handle and it will always be just where you need it lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 50144-c *ckc-toweltopper pdf* skill level easy level 2 lion® cotton article #760 1 ball crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm additional materials 1 cotton kitchen towel one skein embroidery floss in matching color embroidery needle one 1 25 mm button special embellishment embroidery chain stitch see tea towel topper knit 1 for the knit version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tea-towel-topper-knit
